author: bjh
msg: OS/2: off_t is a long in EMX gcc, use "ld" format for it.

author: rbb
msg: Apache serves pages with the latest buckets changes and this new patch.

author: rbb
msg: The write functions are now also function pointers.  This allows people
to easily insert data to a bucket brigade.  I need to re-write the brigade
insert routines, but that can come tomorrow.

author: rbb
msg: I've added a couple of files, so I'm updating the README to reflect that.

author: rbb
msg: Update the bucket brigades to be a bit less complex.  This makes the
functions get_str and get_len function pointers inside the bucket
itself.  This is the first step in cleaning these up just a bit.
